more general framework.from sentence: In this work, we consider a more general framework (subsuming one-hot CNN) which jointly trains a feature generator and a linear model, where the feature generator consists of 'region embedding + pooling'.

build.from sentence: In this work, we build on the general framework of 'region embedding + pooling' and explore a more sophisticated region embedding via Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM), seeking to overcome the shortcomings above, in the supervised and semi-supervised settings.
